S06bsu028pu:4_0: saci rupa saṃjña api vedana cetanā ca vijñāna skandha caratī aprajānamāno /

S06bsu028pu:rgs_1.12_0: evaṃ carantu caratī sugatāna prajñāṃ no cāpi so labhati yatra carāti dharmam /

S06bsu028pu:rgs_1.14_0: māyopamāṃ ya iha jānati pañca skandhāṃ na ca māya anya na ca skandha karoti anyān /

S06bsu028pu:rgs_6.5_0: pariṇāmayantu yadi vartati cittasaṃjñā tatha bodhisattvapariṇāmana sattvasaṃjñā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_6.5_1: saṃjñāya dṛṣṭisthitu citta trisaṅgayukto pariṇāmitaṃ na bhavatī upalabhyamānam //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_6.6_0: saci eva jānati nirudhyati kṣīṇadharmā taccaita kṣīṇa pariṇāmayiṣyanti yatra /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_6.6_1: na ca dharma dharmi pariṇāmayate kadācit pariṇāmitaṃ bhavati eva prajānamāne //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_6.7_0: saci so nimitta kurute na ca mānayāti atha ānimitta pariṇāmita bhonti bodhau /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_6.7_1: viṣasṛṣṭa bhojanu yathaiva kriyāpraṇīto tatha śukladharmaupalambha jinena ukto //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_6.8_0: tasmā hu nāmapariṇāmana śikṣitavyā yatha te jinā kuśala eva prajānayanti /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_6.8_1: yajjātiyo 'yaṃ prabhavo yadalakṣaṇaṃ ca anumodamī tatha tathā pariṇāmayāmi //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_6.9_0: evaṃ ca puṇya pariṇāmayamāna bodhau na ca so hi buddha kṣipate jina uktavādī /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_6.9_1: yāvanti loki upalambhikabodhisattvā abhibhonti sarvi pariṇāmayamāna śūro //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_7.1_1: vina prajña pañca imi pāramitā acakṣuḥ avināyakā na prabhavanti spṛśetu bodhim //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_7.2_0: yatrāntarasmi bhavate pragṛhīta prajñā tatu labdhacakṣu bhavatī imu nāmadheyam /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_7.2_1: yatha citrakarmapariniṣṭhita cakṣuhīno na ca tāva puṇyu labhate akaritva cakṣuḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_7.3_0: yada dharma saṃskṛta asaṃskṛta kṛṣṇaśuklo aṇumātru no labhati prajña vibhāvamānaḥ /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_7.3_1: yada prajñapāramita gacchati saṃkhya loke ākāśa yatra na pratiṣṭhitu kiṃci tatra //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_7.4_0: saci manyate ahu carāmi jināna prajñāṃ mociṣya sattvaniyutāṃ bahurogaspṛṣṭān /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_7.4_1: ayu sattvasaṃjñaparikalpaku bodhisattvo na ca eṣa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_7.5_0: yo bodhisattva varapāramiteti cīrṇo paricārikā ya na ca kāṅkṣati paṇḍitehi /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_7.5_1: saha śrutva tasya puna bheṣyati śāstṛsaṃjñā so vā laghū anubudhiṣyati bodhi śāntām //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_7.6_0: satkṛtya buddhaniyutāṃ paricārikāyāṃ na ca prajñapāramita śraddadhitā jinānām /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_7.6_1: śrutvā ca so imu kṣipiṣyati so 'lpabuddhiḥ sa kṣipitva yāsyati avīcimatrāṇabhūto //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_7.7_0: tasmā hu śraddadhata eva jināna mātāṃ yadi icchathā spṛśitu uttamabuddhajñānam /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_7.7_1: so vāṇijo yatha vrajitvana ratnadvīpaṃ mūlātu chedana karitva puna āgameyā //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_8.1_0: rūpasya śuddhi phalaśuddhita veditavyā phalarūpaśuddhita sarvajñataśuddhimāhuḥ /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_8.2_0: traidhātukaṃ samatikrānta na bodhisattvā kleśāpanīta upapatti nidarśayanti /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_8.2_1: jaravyādhimṛtyuvigatāścyuti darśayanti prajñāya pāramita yatra caranti dhīrāḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_8.3_0: nāmeva rūpi jagatī ayu paṅkasaktā saṃsāracakri bhramate 'nilacakratulye /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_8.3_1: jānitva bhrāntu jagatī mṛgavāgureva ākāśa pakṣisadṛśā vicaranti prajñāḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_8.4_0: rūpasmi yo na carate pariśuddhacārī vijñāna saṃjña api vedana cetanāyām /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_8.4_1: evaṃ carantu parivarjayi sarvasaṅgāṃ saṅgādvimucya carate sugatāna prajñām //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_9.1_0: evaṃ carantu vidu paṇḍitu bodhisattvo saṅgā uchinnu vrajate jagatī asakto /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_9.1_1: sūryo va rāhugrahamukta virocamāno agnīva yukta tṛṇakāṣṭhavanaṃ dahāti //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_9.2_0: prakṛtīya śuddha pariśuddhimi sarvadharmāṃ prajñāya pāramita paśyati bodhisattvo /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_9.2_1: na ca paśyakaṃ labhati nāpi ca sarvadharmān eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_10.1_0: śakro jinasya paripṛcchati devarājo caramāṇa prajña katha yujyati bodhisattvo /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_10.1_1: aṇumātra yo na khalu yujyati skandhadhātau yo eva yujyati(sa yujyati)bodhisattvaḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_10.2_0: cirayānaprasthitu sa vedayitavya sattvo bahubuddhakoṭinayutehi kṛtādhikāro /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_10.2_1: yo śrutva dharmi imi nirmitamāyakalpāṃ na ca kāṅkṣate ayu prayujyati śikṣamāṇaḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_10.3_0: kāntāramārgi puruṣo bahu(bhī)janehi gopāla sīma vanasaṃpada paśyate yo /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_10.3_1: āśvāsaprāpta bhavatī na ca tasya trāso abhyāśa grāmanagarāṇa ime nimittāḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_10.4_0: emeva prajñavarapāramitā jinānāṃ śṛṇu tāta yo labhati bodhi gaveṣamāṇaḥ /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_10.4_1: āśvāsaprāpta bhavatī na ca tasya trāso nārhantabhūmi na pi pratyayabuddhabhūmī //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_10.5_0: puruṣo hi sāgarajalaṃ vraji paśyanāya saci paśyate drumavanaspatiśailarājam /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_10.5_1: athavā na paśyati nimitta nikāṅkṣa bhoti a(bhyāśa)to mahasamudra na so 'tidūre //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_10.6_0: emeva bodhivaraprasthitu veditavyo śruṇamāṇa prajña imi pāramitā jinānām /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_10.6_1: yadyāpi saṃmukha na vyākṛtu nāyakeno tathapi spṛśiṣyati nacireṇa hu buddhabodhim //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_10.7_0: suvasanti kāli patite tṛṇapatraśākhā nacireṇa patraphalapuṣpa samāgamanti /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_10.7_1: prajñāya pāramita yasyimu hastaprāptā nacireṇa bodhivara prāpsyati nāyakānām //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_10.8_0: yatha istri gurviṇi ya ceṣṭati vedanābhi jñātavyu kālu ayamasya prajāyanāya /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_10.8_1: tatha bodhisattva śruṇamāṇu jināna prajñāṃ rati chanda vīkṣati spṛśiṣyati bodhi śīghram //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_10.9_0: caramāṇu prajñavarapāramitāya yogī na ca rūpavṛddhi na ca paśyati pārihāṇim /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_10.9_1: dharmā adharma imu paśyati dharmadhātuṃ na ca nirvṛtiṃ spṛśati so viharāti prajñām //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_10.10_0: caramāṇu yo na iha kalpayi buddhadharmāṃ bala ṛddhipāda na ca kalpayi bodhi śāntām /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_11.1_0: buddhaṃ subhūti paripṛcchati vādicandraṃ kyantantarāyu bhaviṣyanti guṇe ratānām /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_11.1_1: bahu antarāyu bhaviṣyanti bhaṇāti śāsta tatu alpamātra parikīrtayiṣyāmi tāvat //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_11.2_0: pratibhāna neka vividhāni upapadyiṣyanti likhamāna prajña imu pāramitā jinānām /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_11.2_1: yuta śīghra vidyuta yathā parihāyiṣyanti akaritva artha jagatī imu mārakarma //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_11.3_0: kāṅkṣā ca keṣaci bhaviṣyati bhāṣamāṇe na mamātra nāma parikīrtitu nāyakena /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_11.3_1: na ca jāti bhūmi parikīrtitu nāpi gotraṃ na ca so śruṇiṣyati kṣipiṣyati mārakarma //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_11.4_0: evaṃ ta mūlamapahāya ajānamāno śākhāpalāśa parieṣayiṣyanti mūḍhāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_11.4_1: hastiṃ labhitva yatha hastipadaṃ gaveṣe tatha prajñapāramita śrutva sūtrānta eṣet //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_11.5_0: yatha bhojanaṃ śatarasaṃ labhiyāna kaścit mārgeṣu ṣaṣṭiku labhitva sa bhojanāgryam /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_11.5_1: tatha bodhisattva ima pāramitāṃ labhitvā (a)rhantabhūmi(ta) gaveṣayiṣyanti bodhim //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_11.6_0: satkārakāma bhaviṣyanti ca lābhakāmāḥ sāpekṣacitta kulasaṃstavasaṃprayuktāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_11.6_1: choritva dharma kariṣyanti adharmakāryaṃ patha hitva utpathagatā ima mārakarma //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_11.7_0: ye cāpi tasmi samaye imu dharma śreṣṭhaṃ śruṇanāya chandika utpādayiṣyanti śraddhām /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_11.7_1: te dharmabhāṇaka viditvana kāryayuktaṃ premāpanīta gamiṣyanti sudurmanāśca //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_11.8_0: imi mārakarma bhaviṣyanti ya tasmi kāle anye ca neka vividhā bahu antarāyā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_11.8_1: yehī samākulikṛtā bahu bhikṣu tatra prajñāya pāramita etu na dhārayanti //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_11.9_0: ye te bhavanti ratanā ya anarghaprāptā te durlabhā bahupratyarthika nityakālam /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_11.9_1: emeva prajñavarapāramitā jinānāṃ durlābhu dharmaratanaṃ baddupadravaṃ ca //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_11.10_0: navayānaprasthita sa sattva parīttabuddhiḥ ya imaṃ durlābhu dharmaratanaṃ parāpuṇanti /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_11.10_1: māro 'tra utsuku bhaviṣyati antarāye buddhā daśaddiśi parigrahasaṃprayuktāḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_12.1_0: mātrāya putra bahu santi gilāni kāye te sarvi durmanasa tatra prayujyayeyuḥ /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_12.1_1: emeva buddha(piṃ) daśaddiśi lokadhātau ima prajñapāramita mātra samanvāharanti //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_12.2_0: ye 'tīta ye 'pi ca daśaddiśi lokanāthā itu te prasūta bhaviṣyantyanāgatāśca /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_12.2_1: loka(sya) darśika janetri jināna mātā parasattvacittacaritāna nidarśitā(kā) ca //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_12.3_0: lokasya yā tathata yā tathatārhatānāṃ / pratyekabuddhatathatā tathatā jinānām /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_12.3_1: ekaiva bhāvavigatā tathatā ananyā prajñāya pāramita buddha tathāgatena //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_12.4_0: tiṣṭhantu lokavidunāṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ [sthita eṣa dharmataniyāma śūnyadharmā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_12.4_1: tāṃ bodhisattva tathatāmanubuddhayanti tasmā hu buddha kṛta nāma tathāgatebhiḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_12.5_0: ayu gocaro daśabalāna vināyakānāṃ] prajñāya pāramita ramyavanāśritānām /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_12.5_1: dukhitāṃśca sattva triapāya samuddharanti na pi sattvasaṃjña api teṣu kadāci bhoti //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_12.6_0: siṃho yathaiva girikandari niśrayitvā nadate achambhi mṛga kṣudraka trāsayanto /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_12.6_1: tatha prajñapāramitaniśraya narāṇa siṃho nadate achambhi pṛthutīrthika trāsayanto //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_12.7_0: ākāśaniśrita yathaiva hi sūrya[raśmi] tāpetimāṃ dharaṇi darśayate ca rūpam /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_12.7_1: tatha prajñapāramitaniśrita dharmarājo tāpeti tṛṣṇanadi dharma nidarśayāti //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_12.8_0: rūpasya darśanu adarśanu vedanāye saṃjñāya darśanu adarśanu cetanāye /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_12.8_1: vijñānacittamanudarśanu yatra nāsti aya dharmadarśanu nidiṣṭu tathāgatena //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_12.9_0: ākāśa dṛṣṭu iti sattva pravyāharanti nabhadarśanaṃ kutu vimṛṣyatha etamartham /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_12.9_1: tatha dharmadarśanu nidiṣṭa tathāgatena na hi darśanaṃ bhaṇitu śakya nidarśanena //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_13.1_0: yo eva paśyati sa paśyati sarvadharmān sarvānamātyakiriyā ti upekṣya rājā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_13.1_1: yāvanti buddhakriya dharmata śrāvakāṇāṃ prajñāya pāramita sarva karoti tāni //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_13.2_0: na ca rāja grāma vrajate na ca rājyarāṣṭrān sarvaṃ ca ādadati so viṣayātu āyam /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_13.2_1: na ca bodhisattva calate kvaci dharmatāyāṃ sarvāṃśca ādadati ye guṇa buddhadharme //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_14.1_0: yasyāmi śraddha sugate dṛḍha bodhisattvo varaprajñapāramitaāśayasaṃprayogo /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_14.1_1: atikramya bhūmidvaya śrāvakapratyayānāṃ laghu prāpsyate anabhibhū(tu) jināna bodhim //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_14.2_0: sāmudriyāya yatha nāvi praluptikāye bhṛtakaṃ manuṣya tṛṇakāṣṭhamagṛhṇamāno /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_14.2_1: vilayaṃ prayāti jalamadhya aprāptatīro yo gṛhṇate vrajati pārasthalaṃ prayāti //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_14.3_0: emeva śraddhasaṃgato ya prasādaprāpto prajñāya pāramita mātra vivarjayanti /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_14.4_0: ye te bhavanti varaprajñaparigṛhītā bhāvasvabhāvakuśalā paramārthadarśī /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_14.4_1: te puṇyajñānadhanasaṃbhṛtayānapātrāḥ paramādbhutāṃ sugatabodhi spṛśanti śīghram //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_14.5_0: ghaṭake apakvi yatha vāri vaheya kācit jñātavyu kṣipra ayu bhetsyati durbalatvāt /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_14.5_1: paripakvi vāri ghaṭake vahamānu mārge na ca bhedanādbhayamupaiti ca svasti geham //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_14.6_0: kiṃcāpi śraddhabahulo siya bodhisattvo prajñāvihīna vilayaṃ laghu prāpuṇāti /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_14.6_1: taṃ caiva śraddha parigṛhṇayamāna prajñā atikramya bodhidvaya prāpsyati agrabodhim //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_14.7_0: nāvā yathā aparikarmakṛtā samudre vilayamupaiti sadhanā saha vāṇijebhiḥ /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_14.7_1: sā caiva nāva parikarmakṛtā suyuktā na ca bhidyate dhanasamagramupaiti tīram //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_14.8_0: emeva śraddhaparibhāvitu bodhisattvo prajñāvihīnu laghu bodhimupaiti hānim /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_14.8_1: so caiva prajñavarapāramitāsuyukto 'kṣato 'nupāhatu spṛśāti jināna bodhim //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_14.9_0: puruṣo hi jīrṇa dukhito śataviṃśavarṣo kiṃcāpi utthitu svayaṃ na prabhoti gantum /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_14.9_1: so vāmadakṣiṇadvaye puruṣe gṛhīte patanādbhayaṃ na bhavate vrajate sukhena //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_14.10_0: emeva prajña iha durbalu bodhisattvo kiṃcāpi prasthihati bhajyati antareṇa /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_14.10_1: so vā upāyabalaprajñaparigṛhīto na ca bhajyate spṛśati bodhi nararṣabhāṇām //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_15.1_0: yo ādikarma sthitu bhūmiya bodhisattvo adhyāśayena vara prasthita buddhabodhim /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_15.1_1: tehī suśiṣyagurugauravasaṃprayukto kalyāṇamitra sada sevayitavya vijñaiḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_15.2_0: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tatu guṇāgamu paṇḍitānāṃ prajñāya pāramita te anuśāsayanti /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_15.2_1: evaṃ jino bhaṇati sarvaguṇāgradhārī kalyāṇamitramupaniśrita buddhadharmāḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_15.3_0: dānaṃ ca śīlamapi kṣānti tathaiva vīryaṃ dhyānāni prajña pariṇāmayitavya bodhau /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_15.3_1: na ca bodhiskandha vimṛśitva parāmṛśeyā ye ādikarmika na deśayitavya evam //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_15.4_0: evaṃ caranta guṇasāgara vādicandrāḥ trāṇā bhavanti jagatī śaraṇā ca lenā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_15.4_1: gati buddhi dvīpa pariṇāyaka arthakāmāḥ pradyota ulka varadharmakathī akṣobhyāḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_15.5_0: saṃnāhu duṣkarū mahāyaśu saṃnahantī na ca skandhadhātu na ca āyatanaiḥ sanaddhāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_15.5_1: tribhi yānasaṃjñavigatā aparigṛhītā avivartikā acalitāśca akopyadharmāḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_15.6_1: prajñāya pāramita śrutva na sīdayanti aparapraṇeya avivartiya veditavyāḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_15.7_0: gambhīra dharma ayu durdṛśu nāyakānāṃ na ca kenacīdadhigato na ca prāpuṇanti /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_15.7_1: etārthu bodhimadhigamya hitānukampī alpotsuko ka imu jñāsyati sattvakāyo //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_15.8_0: sattvaśca ālayarato viṣayābhilāṣī sthita agrahe abudha yo mahaandhabhūto /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_15.8_1: dharmo anālayu anāgrahu prāpitavyo lokena sārdha ayu vigrahu prādubhūto //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_16.1_0: ākāśadhātu purimādiśi dakṣiṇāyāṃ tatha paścimottaradiśāya anantapārā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_16.1_1: uparādharāya daśaddiśi yāvadasti nānātvatā na bhavate na viśeṣaprāptā //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_16.2_0: atikrānta yā tathata yā tathatā aprāptā pratyutpanna yā tathata yā tathatārhatānām /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_16.2_1: yā sarvadharmatathatā tathatārhatānāṃ sarveṣa dharmatathatā na viśeṣaprāptā //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_16.3_0: yo bodhisattva imi icchati prāpuṇetuṃ nānātvadharmavigatāṃ sugatāna bodhim /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_16.3_1: prajñāya pāramita yujyatu yāya yukto vina prajña nāstyadhigamo naranāyakānām //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_16.4_0: pakṣisya yojanaśataṃ mahatātmabhāvo pañcāśatā pi abalobhayakṣīṇapakṣo /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_16.4_1: so trāyatriṃśabhavanādiṣu jambudvīpe ātmānamosariyi taṃ vilayaṃ vrajeyyā //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_16.5_0: yadyāpi pañca ima pāramitā jinānāṃ bahukalpakoṭiniyutāṃ samudānayeyyā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_16.5_1: praṇidhīnanantavipulāṃ sada sevya loke anupāya prajñavikalā pari śrāvakatve //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_16.6_0: niryāyanāya ya icchati buddhajñāne samacitta sarvajagatī pitṛmātṛsaṃjñā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_16.6_1: hitacitta maitramana eva parākrameyyā akhilārjavo mṛdugirāya parākrameyyā //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_17.1_0: sthaviro subhūti paripṛcchati lokanāthaṃ araṇāya liṅga bhaṇahī guṇasāgarāṇām /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_17.1_1: avivartiyā yatha bhavanti mahānubhāvā tāṃ vyākuruṣva jinaguṇāna pradeśamātram //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_17.2_0: nānātvasaṃjñavigatā gira yuktabhāṇī na ca anya te śramaṇa brāhmaṇa āśrayanti /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_17.2_1: triyapāyavarjita vidū sadakāli bhonti daśabhiśca te kuśalakarmapathebhi yuktā //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_17.3_0: dharmaṃ nirāmiṣu jagasyanuśāsayanti ekāntadharmaniyatāḥ sada snigdhavākyāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_17.4_0: śuciśaucaambaradharā trivivekaśuddhā na ca lābhakāma vṛṣabhā sada dharmakāmāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_17.4_1: mārasyatītaviṣayā aparapraṇeyā catudhyānadhyāyi na ca niśrita tatra dhyāne //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_17.5_0: na ca kīrtikāma na ca krodhaparītacittā gṛhibhūta nitya anadhyoṣita sarva vastuṃ /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_17.5_1: na ca jīvikāviṣayabhoga gaveṣayanti abhicāramantra na ca istriprayogamantrāḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_17.6_0: na ca ādiśanti puruṣaiḥ striya icchakarmāṃ pravivikta prajñavarapāramitābhiyuktāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_17.6_1: kalahāvivādavigatā dṛḍhamaitracittā sarvajñakāma sada śāsani nimnacittāḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_17.7_1: dharmārtha jīvita tyajanti prayuktayogā avivartiyāna imi liṅga prajānitavyā //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_18.1_0: gambhīra rupa api vedana cetanā ca vijñāna saṃjña prakṛtī animittaśāntā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_18.1_1: kāṇḍena gādha yatha sāgari eṣamāṇo prajñāya skandha vimṛṣitva alabdhagādhā //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_18.2_0: yo bodhisattva imu budhyati eva dharmāṃ gambhīrayānaparamārthanirupalepān /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_18.2_1: yasmin na skandha na pi āyatanaṃ na dhātu kiṃ vā svapuṇyasamudāgamu kiṃci tasya //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_18.3_0: yatha rāgadharmacaritaḥ puruṣaḥ striyāye saṃketa kṛtva alabhantu vivartayeyā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_18.3_1: yāvanti cittacaritā divasena tasya tāvanta kalpa anubudhyati bodhisattvo //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_18.4_0: yo bodhisattva bahukalpasahasrakoṭayo dānaṃ dadeyu vimalaṃ tatha śīla rakṣe /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_18.4_1: yaścaiva prajñavarapāramitāprayukto dharmaṃ bhaṇeya kala puṇya na dānaśīle //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_18.5_0: yo bodhisattva varaprajña vibhāvayanto tata utthito kathayi dharma nirupalepam /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_18.5_1: taṃ cāpi nāmayi jagārthanidāna bodhau nāsti triloka śubha tena samaṃ bhaveyā //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_18.6_0: taṃ caiva puṇya puna khyāyati riktameva tatha śūnya tuccha vaśikaṃ ca asārakaṃ ca /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_18.6_1: evaṃ carantu caratī sugatāna prajñāṃ caramāṇu puṇyu parigṛhṇati aprameyam //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_18.7_0: abhilāpamātra ima jānati sarvadharmāṃ buddhena deśita prayukta prakāśitāṃśca /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_18.7_1: kalpāna koṭinayutāṃ bahu bhāṣamāṇo na ca kṣīyate na ca vivardhati dharmadhātuḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_18.8_0: ye cāpi pañca imi pāramitā jinānām ete 'pi dharma parikīrtita nāmamātrāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_18.8_1: pariṇāmayāti na ca manyati bodhisattvo na ca hīyate spṛśati uttamabuddhabodhim //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_19.1_0: tailasya varti jvalitā prathame nipāte na ca dagdha varti asatā na vinā ya dagdhā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_19.1_1: na hi arci paścimanipāta sa varti dagdhā asatā pi paścima na dahyati dīpavarti //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_19.2_0: prathameva citta spṛśatī na ca agrabodhim asatā na tasya spṛśatā puna śakya bhonti /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_19.2_1: na ca citta paścima śivāmanuprāpuṇāti asatā na tasya puna prāpaṇanāya śakyam //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_19.3_0: bījātu stamba phala puṣpa samāgamanti so vāniruddha asato na hi tasya vṛkṣo /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_19.3_1: emeva citta prathamaṃ tu nidāna bodheḥ so vā niruddha asato na hi tasya bodhiḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_19.4_0: bījaṃ pratītya ca bhavedyavaśālikādes tattatphalaṃ na ca tadasti na cāpi nāsti /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_19.4_1: utpattito bhavati bodhiriyaṃ jinānāṃ bhāvasvabhāvavigatā bhavatīha māyā //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_19.5_0: udakabindu kumbha paripūryati stokastokaṃ prathame nipāti anupūrva sa paścimena /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_19.5_1: emeva citta prathamaṃ varabodhihetur anupūrva śuklaguṇapūrṇa bhavanti buddhāḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_19.6_0: śūnyānimittapraṇidhiṃ caramāṇu dharmā na ca nirvṛtiṃ spṛśati no ca nimittacārī /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_19.6_1: yatha nāviko kuśala gacchati ārapāram ubhayānti asthitu na tiṣṭhati arṇavesmin //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_19.7_0: evaṃ carantu na ca manyati bodhisattvo ahu vyākṛto daśabalehi spṛśeya bodhim /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_19.7_1: na ca trāsu bodhi bhavate na ihāsti kiṃcid evaṃ carantu caratī sugatāna prajñām //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_19.8_0: kāntāramārgi durabhikṣi savyādhi lokāṃ paśyitva nāsti bhaya uttari saṃnahante /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_19.8_1: aparāntakoṭi sada yukta prajānamāno aṇumātra kheda manaso na upādiyāti //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.1_0: puna bodhisattva caramāṇu jināna prajñāṃ anupāda skandha imi jānati ādiśūnyān /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.1_1: asamāhito karuṇa prekṣati sattvadhātum atrāntare na parihāyati buddhadharmān //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.2_0: puruṣo yathā kuśala sarvaguṇairupeto balavān dudharṣu kṛtayogya kalāvidhijño /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.3_0: mātā pitā ca parigṛhya saputradāraṃ kāntāramārgi pratipadya bahūamitro /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.3_1: so nirmiṇitva puruṣān bahu śūravīrān kṣemeṇa gatva puna gehamupāgameyyā //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.4_0: emeva yasmi samaye vidu bodhisattvo mahamaitri sarvi upabandhati sattvadhātau /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.4_1: caturo sa māra atikramya dvaye ca bhūmim asmin samādhi sthitu no ca spṛśāti bodhim //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.5_0: ākāśaniśrita samīraṇa āpaskandho ta hi niśritā iha mahāpṛthivī jagacca /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.5_1: sattvāna karmaupabhoganidānameva ākāśasthānu kutu cintayi etamartham //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.6_0: emeva śūnyatapratiṣṭhitu eṣa sattvo jagati kriyāṃ vividha darśayate vicitrām /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.6_1: sattvāna jñānapraṇidhānaadhiṣṭhānameva na ca nirvṛtiṃ spṛśati śūnyata nāsti sthānam //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.7_0: yasmiṃśca kāli vidu paṇḍitu bodhisattvo caratī imāṃ pravara śūnya samādhi śāntām /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.7_1: atrāntare na ca nimitta prabhāvitavyo na ca ānimittasthitu śānta praśāntacārī //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.8_0: pakṣisya nāsti padu gacchata antarīkṣe no cāpi tatra sthitu no ca patāti bhūmau /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.8_1: tatha bodhisattva caramāṇu vimokṣadvāre na ca nirvṛtiṃ spṛśati no ca nimittacārī //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.9_0: iṣvastraśikṣita yathā puruṣodha kāṇḍaṃ kṣepitva anya puna kāṇḍa paraspareṇa /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.9_1: patanāya tasya purimasya na deya bhūmim ākāṅkṣamāṇa puruṣasya pateya kāṇḍam //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.10_0: emeva prajñavarapāramitāṃ caranto prajñā upāya bala ṛddhi vicāramāṇo /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.10_1: tāvanna tāṃ paramaśūnyata prāpuṇoti yāvanna te kuśalamūla bhavanti pūrṇāḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.11_0: bhikṣū yathā paramaṛddhibalenupeto gagane sthito yamaka kurvati prātihāryāṃ /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.11_1: gaticaṃkramaṃ śayaniṣadya nidarśayāti na nivartate na pi ca khidyati yāva tatra //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.12_0: emeva śūnyatasthito vidu bodhisattvo jñānarddhipāramigato aniketacārī /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.12_1: vividhāṃ kriyāṃ jagati darśayate anantāṃ na ca bhajyatī na pi ca khidyati kalpakoṭī //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.13_0: puruṣā yathā mahaprapāti sthihitva kecid ubhi pāṇi chatradvaya gṛhṇa upakṣayeyyā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.13_1: ākāli vāyuravasṛjya mahāprapāte no ca prapāta patiyāti na yāva tatra //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.14_0: emeva sthitva karuṇāṃ vidu bodhisattvo prajñāupāyadvayachatraparigṛhīto /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.14_1: śūnyānimittapraṇidhiṃ vimṛṣāti dharmān na ca nirvṛtiṃ spṛśati paśyati dharmacārī //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.15_0: ratanārthiko yatha vrajitvana ratnadvīpaṃ labdhvāna ratna puna gehamupāgameyyā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.15_1: kiṃcāpi tatra sukha jīvati sārthavāho api duḥkhito manasi bhoti sa jātisaṃgho //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.16_0: emeva śūnyata vrajitvana ratnadvīpaṃ labdhvāna dhyāna bala indriya bodhisattvo /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.16_1: kiṃcāpi nirvṛti spṛśedabhinandamāno api sarvasattva dukhitā manasī bhavanti //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.17_0: abhyantare ya nagare nigame ca grāme kāmārtha vāṇiju yathā gami jānanāya /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.17_1: no cāpi tatra sthihatī na ca ratnadvīpe na ca geha mārgi kuśalo puna bhoti vijño //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.18_0: tatha jñāna śrāvakavimuktisapratyayānāṃ sarvatra bhoti kuśalo vidu bodhisattvo /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.18_1: no cāpi tatra sthihate na ca buddhajñāne na ca saṃskṛte bhavati mārgavidū vidhijño //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.19_0: yaṃ kāli maitri jagatī anubandhayitvā śūnyānimittapraṇidhī carate samādhim /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.19_1: asthānameva yadi nirvṛti prāpuṇeyā athavāpi saṃskṛta sa prajñapanāya śakyaḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.20_0: yatha nirmito puruṣa no va adṛśyakāyo nāmena vā puna sa prajñapanāya śakyaḥ /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.20_1: tatha bodhisattva caramāṇu vimokṣadvāraṃ nāmena vā puna sa prajñapanāya śakyaḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.21_0: yadi pṛcchamāna cari indriya bodhisattvo gambhīradharmaparidīpana no karoti /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.21_1: śūnyānimitta avivartiyabodhidharmāṃ na ca śocatī na ca sa vyākṛtu veditavyo //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.22_0: arhantabhūmimapi pratyayabuddhabhūmau traidhātukaṃ na spṛśate supināntare 'pi /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.22_1: buddhāṃśca paśyati katheti janasya dharmaṃ avivartiyeti ayu vyākṛtu veditavyo //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.23_0: triapāyaprāptu supinasmi viditva sattvān praṇidheti tatkṣaṇa apāya ucchoṣayeyam /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.23_1: satyādhiṣṭhāni praśameti sa cāgniskandham avivartiyeti ayu vyākṛtu veditavyo //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.24_0: bhūtagrahā vividha vyādhaya martyaloke satyādhiṣṭhāni praśameti hitānukampī /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_20.24_1: na ca tena manyanupapadyati nāpi mānam avivartiyeti ayu vyākṛtu veditavyaḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_21.1_0: athavāsya manyanupapadyati vyākṛto 'smi satyādhiṣṭhāna vividhāni samṛddhyayanti /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_21.1_1: yadi anya vyākṛtaku manyati bodhisattvo jñātavya manyanasthito ayu alpabuddhiḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_21.2_0: nāmādhiṣṭhāna puna māra upāgamitvā evaṃ vadiṣyati idaṃ tava nāmadheyam /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_21.2_1: mātāpitāya anusaptamupaiti vaṃśo buddho yadā bhavi idaṃ tava nāmadheyam //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_21.3_0: dhutavṛtta yādṛśu sa bheṣyati yuktayogī pūrvaṃ pi tubhya imi āsi guṇovarūpā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_21.3_1: yo eva śrutva abhimanyati bodhisattvo jñātavyu māru paryutthitu alpabuddhiḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_21.4_0: pravivikta grāmanagare girikandarāṇi raṇyā vivikta vanaprastha niṣevamāṇo /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_21.4_1: ātmānukarṣi para paṃsayi bodhisattvo jñātavyu māru paryutthitu alpabuddhiḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_21.5_0: grāme ca rāṣṭri nigame viharanti nityaṃ rahapratyayāni spṛhatāṃ janayanti tatra /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_21.5_1: anyatra sattvaparipācanabodhiyuktā eṣo viveku kathito sugatātmajānām //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_21.6_1: no cā viveku imu jānati bodhisattvo saṃkīrṇa so viharate adhimānaprāptaḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_21.7_1: abhimanyate na imi raṇyavivekacārī na vivekagocaru ayaṃ hi jinena ukto //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_21.8_0: grāmānti yo viharate athavā araṇye dvayayānacittavigato niyato 'grabodhim /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_21.8_1: eṣo viveku jagadarthabhiprasthitānāṃ ātmā kṣiṇoti tulayeya sa bodhisattvo //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_22.1_0: tasmā hu mānu nihanitvana paṇḍitena guruāśayena varabodhi gaveṣamāṇaḥ /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_22.1_1: vaidyo va ātura svarogacikitsanārthaṃ kalyāṇamitra bhajitavya atandritena //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_22.2_0: buddhā ya bodhivaraprasthita bodhisattvā kalyāṇamitra imi pāramitā nidiṣṭāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_22.2_1: te cānuśāsaka iyaṃ pratipattibhūmī duvi kāraṇena anubudhyati buddhabodhim //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_22.3_0: atikrāntanāgata jinā sthita ye diśāsu sarveṣu mārgu ayu pāramitā ananyo /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_22.3_1: obhāsa ulka varabodhayi prasthitānām āloka śāstri imi pāramitā pradiṣṭāḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_22.4_0: yatha prajñapāramita śūnyata lakṣaṇena tathalakṣaṇā ya imi jānati sarvadharmān /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_22.4_1: śūnyānalakṣaṇa prajānayamāna dharmān evaṃ carantu caratī sugatāna prajñām //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_22.5_0: āhārakāma parikalpayamāna sattvāḥ saṃsāri yuktamanasaḥ sada saṃsmaranti /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_22.5_1: ahu mahya dharma ubhi eti abhūta śūnyā ākāśagaṇṭhi ayu ātmana baddha bāle //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_22.6_0: yatha śaṅkitena viṣasaṃjñata abhyupaiti no cāsya koṣṭhagatu so viṣu pātyate ca /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_22.6_1: emeva bālupagato ahu mahya eṣo ahasaṃjñi jāyi mriyate ca sadā abhūto //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_22.7_0: yatha udgraho tatha prakāśitu saṃkileśo vyodāna ukta ahu mahya anopalabdhi /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_22.7_1: na hi atra kaści yo kliśyati śudhyate vā prajñāya pāramita budhyati bodhisattve //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_22.8_0: yāvanta sattva nikhile iha jambudvipe te sarvi bodhivaracitta upādayitvā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_22.8_1: dānaṃ daditva bahuvarṣasahasrakoṭīḥ sarvaṃ ca nāmayi jagārthanidāna bodhau //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_22.9_0: yaścaiava prajñavarapāramitābhiyukto divasaṃ pi antamaśa ekanuvartayeyā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_22.9_1: kalapuṇya so na bhavatī iha dānaskandho tadatandritena sada osaritavya prajñā //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_22.10_0: caramāṇu prajñavarapāramitāya yogī mahatīṃ janeti karuṇāṃ na ca sattvasaṃjñā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_22.10_1: tada bhonti sarvajagatī vidu dakṣiṇīyā satataṃ amoghu paribhuñjati rāṣṭrapiṇḍam //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_22.11_0: cirabuddhadevamanujān triapāyi sattvān parimocituṃ ya iha icchati bodhisattvo /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_22.11_1: pṛthumārgu tīru upadarśayi sattvadhātau prajñāya pāramita yukta divā ca rātrau //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_22.12_0: puruṣo ya agru ratanasya alabdhapūrvo aparasmi kāli puna labdhva bhaveya tuṣṭo /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_22.12_1: sa ha labdhva nāśayi puno 'pi pramādabhūto nāśitva duḥkhi satataṃ ratanābhikāṅkṣī //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_22.13_0: emeva bodhivaraprasthita ratnatulyo prajñāya pāramita yogu na riñcitavyo /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_22.13_1: ratanaṃ va labdhva gṛhamāṇu abhinnasattvo anubuddhayati tvarito śivamabhyupaiti //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_23.1_0: udayāti sūryu vigatāśca marīcimālā vidhamitva sarva tamasākulamandhakāram /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_23.1_1: avibhonti sarva krimijotikaprāṇabhūtāṃ sarvāṃśca tārakagaṇānapi candraābhām //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_23.2_0: emeva prajñavarapāramitāṃ caranto vidhamitva dṛṣṭigahanaṃ vidu bodhisattvo /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_23.2_1: abhibhonti sarvajagatī rahapratyayāṃśca śūnyānimittacarito pṛthu bodhisattvo //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_23.3_0: yatha rājaputra dhanadāyaku arthakāmo sarveṣu śreṣṭha bhavate abhigāminīye /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_23.3_1: sa hyeṣa etarahi sattva pramocayāti prāgeva rājyasthitu bheṣyati paṭṭadhārī //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_23.4_0: emeva prajñacarito vidu bodhisattvo amṛtasya dāyaku priyo marumānuṣāṇām /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_23.4_1: ayu eṣa eṣati hi sattvasukhābhiyukto prāgeva yāva sthitu bheṣyati dharmarājo //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_24.1_0: māro 'pi tasmi samaye bhavate saśalyo śokātu duḥkhitu anantamano 'lpasthāmo /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_24.1_1: diśadāha ulka kṣipate bhayadarśanārthaṃ kathameṣa dīnamanaso bhavi bodhisattvo //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_24.2_0: [yatha te bhavanti vidu āśayasaṃprayuktā divarātri prajñavarapāramitārthadarśī] /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_24.2_1: tada kāyacitta khagapakṣisatulyabhūtā avatāru so kutu labhiṣyati kṛṣṇabandhuḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_24.3_0: kalahāvivādupagatā yada bodhisattvā bhonti parasparaviruddhaka ruṣṭacittāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_24.3_1: tada māra tuṣṭu bhavatī paramaṃ udagro ubhi eti dūra bhaviṣyanti jināna jñāne //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_24.4_0: ubhi eti dūri bhaviṣyanti piśācatulyā ubhi eti ātma kariṣyanti pratijñahānim /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_24.4_1: duṣṭāna kṣāntivikalāna kuto 'sti bodhi tada māru tuṣṭu bhavatī namucīsapakṣo //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_24.5_0: yo bodhisattva ayu vyākṛtu vyākṛtasmiṃ cittaṃ pradūṣayi vivādu samārabheyyā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_24.5_1: yāvanti cittakṣaṇikā khiladoṣayuktās tāvanta kalpa puna saṃnahitavya bhonti //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_24.6_0: atha tasyupadyati matīti aśobhanā ti kṣāntīya pāramita bodhi spṛśanti buddhāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_24.6_1: pratidarśayāti puna āyati saṃvarāṇi apayāti vā sa iha śikṣati buddhadharme //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_25.1_0: yo śikṣamāṇu na upaiti kahiṃci śikṣāṃ na ca śikṣakaṃ labhati nāpi ca śikṣadharmān /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_25.1_1: śikṣā aśikṣa ubhayo avikalpamāno yo śikṣate sa iha śikṣati buddhadharme //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_25.2_0: yo bodhisattva imu jānati eva śikṣāṃ na sa jātu śikṣavikalo bhavate duśīlo /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_25.2_1: ārādhiteṣu iha śikṣati buddhadharmaṃ śikṣātiśikṣakuśalo ti nirūpalambho //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_25.3_0: śikṣantu eva vidu prajña prabhaṃkarāṇāṃ notpadyate akuśalamapi ekacittam /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_25.3_1: sūrye yathā gagani gacchati antarīkṣe raśmīgate na sthihate purato 'ndhakāram //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_25.4_0: prajñāya pāramita śikṣita saṃskṛtānāṃ sarveṣa pāramita bhontiha saṃgṛhītāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_25.4_1: satkāyadṛṣṭi yatha ṣaṣṭi duve ca dṛṣṭī antargatāstathami pāramitā bhavanti //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_25.5_0: yatha jīvitendriya niruddhi ya kecidanye bhontī niruddha pṛthu indriya yāvadasti /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_25.5_1: emeva prajñacarite vidu uttamānāṃ sarveta pāramita ukta ya saṃgṛhītā //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_25.6_0: ye cāpi śrāvakaguṇā tatha pratyayānāṃ sarveṣu bhonti vidu śikṣitu bodhisattvā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_25.6_1: no cāpi tatra sthihatāna spṛheti teṣām ayu śikṣitavyamati śikṣati etamartham //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_26.1_0: avivartiyasya varabodhayi prasthitasya yo cittupādu anumoditu āśayena /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_26.1_1: trisahasra meru tulayitva siyāpramāṇo na tveva tasya kuśalasyanumodanāye //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_26.2_0: yāvanta sattva kuśalārthika mokṣakāmā sarveṣa bhonti anumoditu puṇyarāśi /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_26.2_1: sattvarthi te jinaguṇa ananta prāpuṇitvā dāsyanti dharma jagatī dukhasaṃkṣayāye //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_26.3_0: yo bodhisattva avikalpaku sarvadharmān śūnyānimitta parijānati niṣprapañcān /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_26.3_1: na ca prajña bodhi parieṣati āśayena so yukta prajñavarapāramitāya yogī //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_26.4_0: ākāśadhātu gaganasya siyā virodho na hi tena tasya kutu kenacideṣa prāptā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_26.4_1: emeva prajñacarito vidu bodhisattvo abhyovakāśasadṛśo upaśāntacārī //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_26.5_0: yatha māyakārapuruṣasya na eva bhoti te śiṣya māṃ janata so ca karoti kāryam /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_26.5_1: paśyanti taṃ vividha kāryu nidarśayantaṃ na ca tasya kāyu na pi citta na nāmadheyam //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_26.6_0: emeva prajñacarite na kadāci bhoti buddhitva bodhi jagatī parimocayitvā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_26.6_1: ātmopapatti vividhāṃ kriyasaṃprayogāṃ darśeti māyasadṛśo na vikalpacārī //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_26.7_0: yatha buddha nirmita karoti ca buddhakāryaṃ na ca tasyupadyati mado karamāṇu kiṃcit /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_26.7_1: emeva prajñacarito vidu bodhisattvo darśeti sarva kriya nirmitamāyatulyam //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_26.8_0: palagaṇḍa dakṣa vidunā kṛtu dāruyantro puruṣe stritulya sa karoti ha sarvakāryam /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_26.8_1: emeva prajñacarito vidu bodhisattvo jñānena sarva kriya kurvati nirvikalpo //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_27.1_0: evaṃ carantu vidu nā pṛthudevasaṃghāḥ kṛtaañjalīpuṭa praṇamya namasyayanti /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_27.1_1: buddhā pi yāvata daśaddiśi lokadhātau guṇavarṇamālaparikīrtana kurvayanti //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_27.2_0: yāvanti gaṅganadivālisame hi kṣetre sattvā ta sarvi parikalpa bhaveyu mārāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_27.2_1: ekaika roma puna tāntaka nirmiṇeyyā sarve na śakya karaṇe vidu antarāyam //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_27.3_0: catukāraṇehi balavāṃ vidu bodhisattvo bhavate dugharṣu catumāraasaṃprakampyo /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_27.3_1: śūnyāvihāri bhavate na ca sattvatyāgī yathavādi sattvakaruṇānugatāvasthānaḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_27.4_0: yo bodhisattva adhimucyati bhāṣyamāṇām ima prajñapāramita māta tathāgatānām /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_27.4_1: pratipattiyā ca abhiyujyati āśayena sarvajñatāya abhiprasthitu veditavyo //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_27.5_0: na ca dharmadhātutathatāya upaiti sthānaṃ bhavatī athānasthita so laghu antarīkṣe /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_27.5_1: vidyādharo va abhilambhu vanābhiprāyā khagu kālahīna druma mantrabalādhiṣṭhāno //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_27.6_0: evaṃ carantu vidu paṇḍitu bodhisattvo na ca budhyakaṃ labhati nāpi ca buddhadharmān /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_27.6_1: na ca deśikaṃ na pi ca paśyaka dharmatāyāṃ śāntaiṣiṇāmayu vihāra guṇe ratānām //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_27.7_0: yāvanta śrāvakavihāra sapratyayānāṃ śāntā samādhipraśame sukhasaṃprayuktā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_27.7_1: arhanvimokṣa sthapayitva tathāgatānāṃ sarveṣu agra ayu vihāru niruttaraśca //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_27.8_0: ākāśi pakṣi viharāti na co patāti dakamadhyi matsya viharāti na co marāti /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_27.8_1: emeva dhyānabalapāragu bodhisattvo śūnyāvihāri na ca nirvṛti prāpuṇāti //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_27.9_0: yo sarvasattvaguṇaagratu gantukāmo agraṃ spṛśeya paramādbhuta buddhajñānam /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_27.9_1: agraṃ dadeya vara uttamadharmadānam imu agru sevatu vihāru hitaṃkarāṇām //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_28.1_0: yāvanti śikṣa paridīpita nāyakena sarveṣa śikṣa ayu agru niruttarā ca /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_28.1_1: yaḥ sarvaśikṣavidu icchati pāra gantum imu prajñapāramita śikṣati buddhaśikṣām //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_28.2_0: agraṃ nidhāna ayu uttamadharmakośa buddhāna gotrajananaṃ sukhasaukhyagañjo /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_28.2_1: atikrāntanāgata daśaddiśi lokanāthā itu te prasūta na ca kṣīyati dharmadhātuḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_28.3_0: yāvanti vṛkṣa phalapuṣpavanaspatī yā sarve ca medinisamudgata prādubhūtāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_28.3_1: na ca medinī kṣayamupaiti na cāpi vṛddhiṃ na ca khidyatī na parihāyati nirvikalpā //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_28.4_0: yāvanta buddhasama śrāvakapratyayāśca marutaśca sarvajagatī sukhasaukhyadharmāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_28.4_1: sarve ti prajñavarapāramitāprasūtā na ca kṣīyate na ca vivardhati jātu prajñā //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_28.5_0: yāvanta sattva mṛdumadhyamutkṛṣṭa loke sarve avidyaprabhavā sugatena uktāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_28.5_1: sāmagripratyayu pravartati duḥkhayantro na ca yantra kṣīyati avidya na cāpi vṛddhiḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_28.6_0: yāvanti jñāna nayadvāra uyāyamūlāḥ sarve ti prajñavarapāramitāprasūtāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_28.6_1: sāmagripratyaya pravartati jñānayantro na ca prajñapāramita vardhati hīyate vā //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_28.7_0: yo tu pratītyasamutpādu anudbhavāye imu prajña akṣayata budhyati bodhisattvo /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_28.7_1: so sūrya abhrapaṭale yatha muktaraśmī vidhamitvavidyapaṭalaṃ bhavate svayaṃbhūḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_29.1_0: caturbhī ca dhyāna viharanti mahānubhāvā na ca ālayo na pi ca niśrayu kurvayāti /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_29.1_1: api kho punāśrayu ime catudhyāna sāṅgā bheṣyanti bodhivarauttamaprāpaṇāya //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_29.2_0: dhyāne sthito 'tra bhavatī varaprajñalābhī ārūpyarūpi ca samādhi catasra śreṣṭhā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_29.2_1: upakāribhūta imi dhyāna varāgrabodhau na punāsravakṣati sa śikṣati bodhisattvo //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_29.3_0: āścaryamadbhutamidaṃ guṇasaṃcayānāṃ dhyāne samādhi viharanti nimitta nāsti /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_29.3_1: tatra sthitāna yadi bhajyati ātmabhāvo puna kāmadhātu upapadyati yathābhiprāyā //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_29.4_0: yatha jambudvīpaka manuṣya alabdhapūrvā divi devauttamapurā anuprāpuṇeyā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_29.4_1: paśyitva te viṣaya tatra parigṛhītā punarāgameya na ca niśrayu tatra kuryāt //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_29.5_0: emeva te guṇadharā varabodhisattvā dhyāne samādhi viharitva prayuktayogī /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_29.5_1: puna kāmadhātusthita bhonti anopaliptā padmeva vāriṇi aniśrita bāladharme //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_29.6_0: anyatra sattvaparipācana kṣetraśodhī paripūraṇārtha imi pāramitā mahātmā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_29.6_1: ārūpyadhātuupapatti na prārthayantī yatreha bodhiguṇapāramitāna hāni //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_29.7_0: yatha kaścideva puruṣo ratanaṃ nidhānaṃ labdhvā tu tatra spṛhabuddhi na saṃjaneyyā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_29.7_1: ekāki so puna gṛhītva parasmi kāle gṛhṇitva geha praviśitva na bhoti lubdho //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_29.8_0: emeva dhyāna catureva samādhi śāntāṃ labdhvāna prīti sukhadāṃ vidu bodhisattvāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_29.8_1: avasṛjya dhyānasukhaprītisamādhilābhaṃ puna kāmadhātu praviśanti jagānukampī //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_29.9_0: yadi bodhisattva viharāti samādhidhyāne rahapratyayāni spṛhabuddhi na saṃjaneyyā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_29.9_1: asamāhito bhavati uddhatakṣiptacitto parihīnabuddhiguṇa nāvika bhinnanāvo //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_29.10_0: kiṃcāpi rūpamapi śabda tathaiva gandho rasa sparśa kāmaguṇa pañcabhi yukta bhogī /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_29.10_1: rahapratyayāna vigato 'nantabodhisattvo satataṃ samāhitu prajānayitavya śūro //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_29.11_1: yatha kumbhadāsi avaśāvaśa bhartikasya tatha sarvasattvavaśatāmupayānti dhīrāḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_29.12_0: na ca svāmikasya prativākyu dadāti dāsī ākruṣṭa cāpi athavā sada tāḍitā vā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_29.12_1: ekāntatrastamanasā sa bhayābhibhūtā māmeva so anu vadhiṣyati kāraṇena //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_29.13_0: emeva bodhivaraprasthitu bodhisattvo tiṣṭheya sarvajagatī yatha preṣyabhūto /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_29.13_1: anu bodhiāgamu guṇāna ca pāripūrī tṛṇa agni kāṣṭhaprabhavo dahate tameva //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_29.14_0: avasṛjya ātma sugatāṃ parasattvakārye abhiyukta rātridiva niṣpratikāṅkṣacitto /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_29.14_1: māteva ekasutake paricāryamāṇo adhyāśaye na parikhinna upasthiheti //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_30.1_1: na ca khedabuddhi aṇumātra upādiyāti so vīryapāramitayukta atandritaśca //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_30.2_0: saci kalpakoṭi gaṇaye vidu bodhisattvo cirasaṃjña bodhi samudāniya tena duḥkhe /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_30.2_1: ciraduḥkha bheṣyati samācaramāṇu dharmaṃ tatu vīryapāramitahīna kusīdarūpo //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_30.3_0: prathamaṃ upādu varabodhayi cittupādo so vā anuttaraśivāmanuprāpuṇeyā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_30.3_1: rātriṃdivaikamanasā tamadhiṣṭhiheyā ārambhavīrya vidu paṇḍitu veditavyo //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_30.4_0: saci kaścideva vadayeya sumeruśailaṃ bhinditva paśca adhigamyasi agrabodhim /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_30.4_1: saci khedabuddhi kurute ca pramāṇabuddhiṃ kausīdyaprāpta bhavate tada bodhisattvo //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_30.5_0: atha tasyupadyati matī kimutālpamātraṃ kṣaṇamātra bhasma nayatī vilayaṃ sumerum /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_30.5_1: ārambhavīrya bhavate vidu bodhisattvo nacireṇa bodhivara lapsyati nāyakānām //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_30.6_0: saci kāyacittavacasā ca parākrameyyā paripācayitva jagatī kariṣyāmi artham /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_30.6_1: kausīdyaprāpta bhavatī sthitu ātmasaṃjñaiḥ nairātmabhāvanavidūri nabhaṃ va bhūmeḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_30.7_0: yasminna kāyu na pi citta na sattvasaṃjñā saṃjñāvivarti sthitu advayadharmacārī /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_30.7_1: ayu vīryapāramita ukta hitaṃkareṇa ākāṅkṣamāṇu śivamacyutamagrabodhim //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_30.8_0: paruṣaṃ śruṇitva vacanaṃ parato duruktaṃ paritoṣayāti susukhaṃ vidu bodhisattvo /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_30.8_1: ko bhāṣate ka śṛṇute kutu kasya kena so yukta kṣāntivarapāramitāya vijño //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_30.9_0: so bodhisattva kṣamate guṇadharmayukto yaścaiva ratnabharitaṃ trisahasra dadyāt /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_30.9_1: buddhāna lokavidunārhatapratyayānāṃ kalapuṇya so na bhavate iha dānaskandhe //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_30.10_1: [sattvāna śūnyavaradharma niśāmayātī priyu bhoti sarvajagatī kṣamamāṇu vijño //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_30.11_0: saci kaści candanapuṭaṃ grahiyāna sattvo abhyokireya gurupremata bodhisattvam /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_30.11_1: dvitīyo 'pi] agni sakale śirasi kṣipeyā ubhayatra tulyu manu tena upāditavyo //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_30.12_0: evaṃ kṣamitva vidu paṇḍitu bodhisattvo taṃ cittupādu pariṇāmayi agrabodhau /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_30.12_1: yāvanti kṣānti rahapratyayasattvadhātoḥ abhibhoti sarvajagatī kṣamamāṇu śūraḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_30.13_0: kṣamamāṇu eva puna citta upāditavyo narakeṣu tiryayamaloki aneka duḥkhā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_30.13_1: anubhūya kāmaguṇahetu akāmakārā kasmā hu adya na kṣameya nidāna bodhau //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_30.14_1: yāvanti duḥkha jagatī ahu tatsahāmi kṣāntīya pāramita tiṣṭhati bodhisattvo //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.1_0: śīlena udgata bhavanti samādhikāṅkṣī sthita gocare daśabalāna akhaṇḍaśīlāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.1_1: yāvanti saṃvarakriya anuvartayanti tāṃ sarvasattvahita bodhayi nāmayanti //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.2_0: saci pratyayānarahabodhi spṛhāṃ janeti [duḥśīla bhoti]viduṣāṃ tatha chidracārī /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.2_1: atha bodhi uttamaśivāṃ pariṇāmayanti sthitu śīlapāramita kāmaguṇebhi yukto //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.3_0: yo dharma bodhiguṇaāgamu sūratānāṃ so śīlaarthu guṇadharmasamanvitānām /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.3_1: yo dharma bodhiguṇahāni hitaṃkarāṇāṃ duḥśīlatā ayu prakāśitu nāyakena //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.4_0: yadi pañca kāmaguṇa bhuñjati bodhisattvo buddhaṃ ca dharma śaraṇāgatu āryasaṃgham /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.4_1: sarvajñatā ca manasī bhaviṣyāmi buddho sthitu śīlapāramita vedayitavya vijño //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.5_0: yadi kalpakoṭi daśabhī kuśalaiḥ pathebhiś caramāṇu pratyayarahatvaspṛhāṃ janeti /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.5_1: tada khaṇḍaśīlu bhavate api chidraśīlo pārājiko gurutaro ayu cittupādo //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.6_0: rakṣantu śīla pariṇāmayi agrabodhiṃ na ca tena manyati na ātmana karṣayethā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.6_1: ahusaṃjñatā ca parivarjita sattvasaṃjñā sthitu śīlapāramiti vucyati bodhisattvo //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.7_0: yadi bodhisattva caramāṇu jināna mārge imi śīlavānimi duśīla karoti sattvān /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.7_1: nānātvasaṃjñaprasṛto paramaṃ duśīlo api chidraśīlu na tu so pariśuddhaśīlo //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.8_0: yasyo na asti ahasaṃjña na sattvasaṃjñā saṃjñāvirāgu kutu tasya asaṃvaro 'sti /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.8_1: yasyo na saṃvari asaṃvari manyanāsti ayu śīlasaṃvaru prakāśitu nāyakena //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.9_0: yo evaśīlasamanvāgatu niṣprapañco anapekṣako bhavati sarvapriyāpriyeṣu /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.9_1: śirahastapāda tyajamāna adīnacitto sarvāstityāgi bhavate satataṃ alīno //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.10_0: jñātvā ca dharmaprakṛtīṃ vaśikā nirātmyaṃ ātmāna māṃsa tyajamānu adīnacitto /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.10_1: prāgeva vastu tada bāhira nātyajeyā asthānameta yadi matsari so kareyā //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.11_0: ahasaṃjñatastu mamatā bhavate ca rāgo kutu tyāgabuddhi bhaviṣyati sā muhānām /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.11_1: mātsarya preta bhavate upapadyayātī athavā manuṣya tada bhoti daridrarūpo //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.12_0: tada bodhisattva imi jñātva daridrasattvān dānādhimukta bhavatī sada muktatyāgī /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.12_1: catvāri dvīpi samalaṃkṛtu kheṭatulyaṃ dattvā udagra bhavate na hi dvīpalabdho //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.13_0: dānaṃ daditva vidu paṇḍitu bodhisattvo yāvanti sattva tribhave samanvāharitvā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.13_1: sarveṣu teṣu bhavate ayu dattadānaṃ taṃ cāgrabodhi pariṇāmayate jagārtham //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.14_0: na ca vastuniśrayu karoti daditva dānaṃ vidu pāku naiva pratikāṅkṣati so kadācit /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.14_1: evaṃ tyajitva bhavate vidu sarvatyāgī alpaṃ tyajitva labhate bahu aprameyam //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.15_0: yāvanta sattva tribhave nikhilena asti te sarvi dāna dadayanti anantakalpān /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.15_1: buddhānuloki vidu nārhatipratyayānāṃ yāvanti śrāvakaguṇān parikalpa sthāne //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.16_0: yaśco upāyakuśalo vidu bodhisattvo teṣāṃ sa puṇyakriyavastvanumodayitvā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.16_1: sattvārtha agravarabodhayi nāmayeyā abhibhoti sarvajagatī pariṇāmayukto //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.17_0: kācasya vā maṇina rāśi siyā mahanto vaiḍūryaratna abhibhoti sa sarva eko /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.17_1: emeva sarvajagatī pṛthu dānaskandho abhibhoti sarvapariṇāmaku bodhisattvo //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.18_0: yadi bodhisattva dadamāna jagasya dānaṃ mamatāṃ na tatra karayenna ca vastuprema /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_31.18_1: tatu vardhate kuśalamūla mahānubhāvo candro va tatra prabhamaṇḍalu śuklapakṣe //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_32.1_0: dānena pretagati chindati bodhisattvo dāridrakaṃ ca chinatī tatha sarvakleśān /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_32.1_1: bhogāṃścanantavipulāṃ labhate caranto dānena sattva paripācayi kṛcchraprāptān //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_32.2_0: śīlena tīryagati varjayi nekarupām aṣṭau ca akṣaṇa kṣaṇāṃ labhate sa nityam /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_32.2_1: kṣāntīya rupa labhate paramaṃ udāraṃ suvarṇacchavi priyu jagasya udīkṣaṇīyo //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_32.3_0: vīryeṇa śuklaguṇa hāni na abhyupaiti jñānaṃ ananta labhate jinakośagañjam /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_32.3_1: dhyānena kāmaguṇa utsṛjate jugupsyān vidyā abhijña abhinirharate samādhim //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_32.4_0: prajñāya dharmaprakṛtī parijānayitvā traidhātukānta samatikramate apāyān /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_32.4_1: vartitva cakraratanaṃ puruṣarṣabhāṇāṃ deśeti dharma jagatī dukhasaṃkṣayāye //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_32.5_0: paripūrayitva imi dharma sa bodhisattvo api kṣetraśuddhi parigṛhṇati sattvaśuddhim /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_32.5_1: api buddhavaṃśa parigṛhṇati dharmavaṃśaṃ tatha saṃghavaṃśa parigṛhṇati sarvadharmān //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_32.6_0: vaidyottamo jagati rogacikitsakārī prajñopadeśa kathito ayu bodhimārgo /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_32.6_1: nāmena ratnaguṇasaṃcaya bodhimārgaḥ taṃ sarvasattva itu mārgatu prāpnuvanti //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_hpr_1_0: lokaṃ prāpayituṃ sukhena padavīṃ saṃpaddūyāvāhinīṃ kāruṇyāhitacetasā bhagavatā buddhena saṃdīpitam /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_hpr_1_1: śrutvā te 'khiladharmatattvanilayaṃ sūtraṃ samādānato gatvā sthānamaharniśaṃ nijamalaṃ dhmāyantu ye 'bhyāgatāḥ /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_hpr_2_0: kāle 'smin bahudṛṣṭisaṃkulakalau pāṭhe 'pi dūraṃ gate gāthābhedamanekapustakagataṃ dṛṣṭvādhunā nyāyataḥ /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_hpr_2_1: kūpaṃ vādigajendrakumbhadaraṇe bhadreṇa yā śodhitā lokārthaṃ hariṇā mayā suvihitā seyaṃ budhairgṛhyatām /
S06bsu028pu:71_0: āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyā bhagavatyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ parivartānusāreṇa bhagavatī ratnaguṇasaṃcayagāthā samāptā /
S06bsu028pu:72_0: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
S06bsu028pu:73_0: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
S06bsu028pu:rgs_lpr_1_0: yo 'sau dharmaṃ sugatagaditaṃ paṭhate bhaktibhāvān mātrāhīnaṃ kathamapi padaṃ pādagāthākṣaraṃ vā /
S06bsu028pu:rgs_lpr_1_1: jihvādoṣaiḥ pavanacaritaiḥ śleṣmadoṣapracārair yūyaṃ buddhāḥ subhavanagatā bodhisattvāḥ kṣamadhvam /
